title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description: Plan and execute digital marketing campaigns, including SEO, social media, and email.

title: SEO Analyst
description: Optimize websites for search engines, conduct keyword research, and analyze SEO.

title: Social Media Manager
description: Manage social media accounts, create content, and engage with the online community.

title: Content Marketing Strategist
description: Develop content marketing strategies, create engaging content, and track content.

title: Email Marketing Specialist
description: Design and execute email marketing campaigns, segment lists, and analyze email.

title: PPC Advertising Manager
description: Manage pay-per-click advertising campaigns, optimize ad spend, and analyze ROI.
